name: Jadid Online
description: An online magazine with relatively short articles accompanied by audio clips with picture slideshows that is excellent for learners. Topics range cover a wide range of topics within the Persian-speaking world.

name: UT Austin: Grammar & Resources
description: Primarily a pedagogical reference for Persian grammar as well as limited general language information/ resources.

name: Persian of Iran Today
description: Publicly available two-part introductory textbooks.

name: Cafe Denj
description: A video series intended for Persian language learners.

name: Persian Language Online
description: Excercises and lessons designed for self-guided learning. Full of excellent, original content.

name: PersianDee
description: Primarily a pedagogical reference for Persian grammar as well as limited general language information/ resources.

name: NYU Virtual Persian
description: A curated series of reading exercises with accompanying recordings/ translations. Exercises range from introductory conversations to more advanced book excerpts.

name: Easy Persian
description: A curated series of exercises that primarily focuses on grammar but cover a wide range of topics ranging from various vocaublary, short stories, and songs. The grammar section is in depth and there are a lot of examples but the organization of content is not great.

name: Loecsen
description: Basic conversational lessons covering everyday topics. There are accompanying illustrations for each situation and recording. A unique feature of this resource is that you can record your voice and check if your pronunciation independently.

name: Forvo
description: A large collection of words/phrases that include user-generated pronunciations.

name: Memrise courses
description: A collection of open source language courses covering a variety of topics. Focussed on vocabulary and often broken into themes. Quality can vary but there are quaility resources.

name: Persian verb conjugator
description: Conjugates common verbs to view all tenses.

name: Persian Grammar
description: A well-organized reference for persian grammar. Reference is also available in Persian as well if reader is advanced enough.

name: Typing Speed practice
description: An online too for increasing typing speed in Persian. Consider practing with both a computer and phone to improve overall skills.

name: Google Translate
description: Translations are not always perfect especially for sentences but if you are more advanced, you can sort through its shortcomings and use it as a powerful tool. Itâ€™s great for looking up words that you vaguely remember but want to confirm. You can both speak and write in Persian and it will convert this input into a translation. Still not text to speech in Persian.

name: Ganjoor
description: The premiere online collection of persian poetry from a variety of poetry accompanied with recordings.

name: Lyrics + Translations
description: Open-source collection of song lyrics in Persian with English translation. Quality may vary and is dependent on each translator.

name: Movie Streaming
description: IMVbox is a subscription-based platform to stream Iranian films. A number of them are free to watch.

name: Calligraphy Qalam
description: Contains a variety of interactive tools and information to help you learn more about calligraphy in the Arab, Ottoman and Persian traditions.

name: Vajehyab dictionary
description: Comprehensive online searchable Persian dictionary.

name: Quizlet flashcards
description: Open-source vocabulary flashcards posted by community.

name: Persian in Context
description: Publicly available textbooks from NC State University.

name: Farsi123
description: A dictionary with excellent examples that include idioms. Much richer content than something like google translate.

name: BBC Persian.
description: BBC news for Persian speakers. Extensive news and includes articles, podcasts, and videos
